d:
An accidental drink turns her body into a malleable substance! But testing her new shapeshifting powers goes wrong when she can't stop growing. To avoid crushing the room, she redirects the mass...

This one was kind of an experiment for me â€” I wanted to try a few different approaches to making comics and see how well I could work with a slime girl character.

I'd love it if you could check out my Patreon!
There's even more comics on similar themes, and plenty of other goodies too ðŸ˜Š
